channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kendra Scott says she launched her billion-dollar business from her bedroom with just $500 when she was pregnant with her first son
item.description: Scott started at the bottom, but is now one of the few women in the U.S. to have founded a billion-dollar company.

item.title: Federal Reserve faces dilemma amid expected rate cut decision
item.description: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates 25-basis-points at its meeting this week, though elevated inflation has created a dilemma for po...

item.title: Pregnancy Care Ends Too Soon. How The Postpartum System Fails Mothers.
item.description: Women often feel unsupported while postpartum, a time when they are most at risk for physical, emotional, and social challenge. Experts share how they...

item.title: Microsoft Says Windows 11 Isn’t Broken Even When Duplicate Updates Appear
item.description: With multiple recent Windows updates causing problems for users, Microsoft says that it’s safe to ignore certain updates even when duplicates appear.

item.title: Skyrocketing valuations, revenues, and investments: ‘That sounds like a tech story. It’s a women’s sports story,’ Alexis Ohanian says
item.description: Women’s sports revenue is expected to hit a record-breaking $2.35 billion this year.

item.title: Wall Street’s bull run reaches a make-or-break week as Trump-Xi talks and Fed decisions loom
item.description: The S&P 500 has shot up a stunning 37% since hitting a low in April.

item.title: The Water–Energy Nexus: The Hidden Infrastructure Of Resilience
item.description: How the water–energy nexus is emerging as the hidden infrastructure of resilience and why efficiency could be the fastest path to climate and business...

item.title: ‘IT: Welcome To Derry’ Gets Early Episode 2 Release, Has 3 Season Plan
item.description: Episode 2 of IT: Welcome to Derry is airing early on HBO Max, and we now know this show wants to run for at least three seasons.

item.title: Qualcomm CEO warns that ‘everybody’s playing to win’ when it comes to an AI bubble—but it’s still too early to tell who will succeed
item.description: Cristiano Amon says AI’s long-term potential is being underestimated, even as growing hype and soaring valuations spark comparisons to the dot-com bub...

item.title: Syria’s only female minister on what she says to her new president about hiring women: ‘quotas are so important’
item.description: "Syria is a mosaic," H.E. Hind Kabawat told Fortune, herself a member of the Christian minority and an exile from the country for some 14 years.

item.title: Qualcomm Readies Rack-Scale AI With New Chips And Roadmap
item.description: Qualcomm announces new chips, cards and rack-scale solutions for the AI data center, but omits key details.

item.title: Argentina ETF surges 16% after Javier Milei's party outperforms polls,

item.title: Social Security COLA for 2026 revealed following shutdown-related delay

item.title: Inflation remained well above the Fed's target in September ahead of rate cut decision
item.description: Inflation remained elevated in September as the BLS released the delayed consumer price index inflation report, as Fed policymakers are set to weigh i...

item.title: Mortgage rates drop to lowest level in over a year as buyers regain leverage
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.19%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down fr...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
